body_html:
Same problem. @prb12 I have set LD_LIBRARY_PATH.
BTW, I can import&use TF successfully 3 weeks ago in the same PC.
I haven't touch cuda related file. Strange...
BTW2, I cant find libcudnn.so not just in usr/local/cuda, but in the whole PC...
how could this file disappeared??
